content.p: Staff IT accounts provide access to the following services: An IT account is issued to each member of staff when they join the university. To register for an account please visit the IT Services office on campus for further assistance. IT account holders can manage their own password. When you change your password for one service, your password will automatically change for other services too. Please access the online password changer to change your password. Please contact our IT Service Desk for assistance. All staff must take full responsibility for activity within their IT account and adhere to the Code of Practice. Account owners are requested to take appropriate care with their account details/passwords. telephone: +603 8924 8199 fax: +603 8924 8007 email: itservicedesk@nottingham.edu.my
